de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.model

Class BaseModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.model.BaseModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusterModel, CorrelationModel, DendrogramModel, DimensionModel, LinearEquationModel, MeanModel, MedoidModel, OPTICSModel

    public abstract class BaseModel
extends Object
implements Model
    Abstract base class for Cluster Models.

      • writeToText

        public void writeToText(TextWriterStream out,
               String label)
        Implement writeToText as per TextWriteable interface. However BaseModel is not given the interface directly, since it is meant as signal to make Models printable.
        Parameters:
        out - Output steam
        label - Optional label to prefix
